text.section: In this section, "rural zone" means an area of Montgomery County designated as a Rural Zone, Rural Cluster Zone, Rural Density Transfer Zone, Rural Neighborhood Cluster Zone, or Rural Service Zone as described in the Montgomery County Code Zoning Ordinance.

section.section:
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, in Montgomery County, an on-site sewage disposal system or well located in a rural zone may only serve one additional lot or parcel that has been subdivided from a single property on which the on-site sewage disposal system or well is located under an on-site sewage disposal system easement or well easement, respectively, provided that:
The property on which the on-site sewage disposal system or well is located does not have an existing on-site sewage disposal system easement or well easement;
The subdivision of the property was made in accordance with a State or county agricultural land conservation program if the property is subject to an agricultural land conservation easement; and
Only one on-site sewage disposal system easement may serve only one subdivided lot or parcel.

An easement for an on-site sewage disposal system or well under paragraph (1) of this subsection may be granted from the original parcel to a new lot or parcel being created and the easement must not be granted to any lot or parcel that did not originate from the same original parcel.

text.section:
An on-site sewage disposal system or well under subsection (b)(1) of this section may not:
Serve land that is designated by the State or the governing body of Montgomery County as a special protection area; or
Decrease the land available for agricultural production by more than 4,000 square feet.
